import { useContractCall, useEthers } from "@usedapp/core"
import TokenFarm from "../chain-info/DaughterContract.json"
import { utils, BigNumber, constants } from "ethers"

import networkMapping from "../chain-info/map.json"
import brownieConfig from "../brownie-config-json.json"
import helperConfig from "../helper-config.json"

/**
 * Get the staking balance of a certain token by the user in our TokenFarm contract
 * @param address - The contract address of the token
 */
export const AllowanceUser2 = (): BigNumber | undefined => {
  const { account, chainId } = useEthers()
  console.log("FIRST12")
  const { abi } = TokenFarm
  const networkName = chainId ? helperConfig[chainId] : "ganache"
  const NFTAddy = chainId ? brownieConfig["networks"][networkName]["NFTBOOK"] : constants.AddressZero
  const NFTAddy2 = chainId ? brownieConfig["networks"][networkName]["weth_token"] : constants.AddressZero
  const NFTAddy3 = chainId ? brownieConfig["networks"][networkName]["fau_token"] : constants.AddressZero
  const tokenFarmInterface = new utils.Interface(abi)

  const [stakingBalance] =
    useContractCall({
      abi: tokenFarmInterface,
      address: NFTAddy2,
      method: "allowance",
      args: [account, NFTAddy],
    }) ?? [] 
    
    console.log("2rfsd", stakingBalance)
 
  return stakingBalance
}
